body.en:
We are a pre-loved luxury boutique in the heart of Budapest, curating handbags and accessories with stories and character.
Our selection focuses on classic houses,and we only deal in AUTHENTIC items.

body.en:
1. Send us photos of the item and basic information via WhatsApp (brand, model, purchase channel, condition, etc.).
2. We make a preliminary evaluation and suggest a selling price.
3. Book an in-store appointment to inspect the item and confirm the price and details.
4. Sign the consignment contract and place the item on display â€“ the minimum consignment period is 60 days.
